content: you can crochet these simple fingerless gloves in no time the pattern and construction are very straightforward the beautiful stitch i ve chosen ensures these gloves are as cozy as they are warm while maintaining the perfect stretch for a snug fit it is very easy to adjust the pattern to different sizes free pattern in english ---> link 1 patroon in het nederlands ---> link 2 1 https //free-crochet-patterns com/free-crochet-pattern-simple-fingerless-gloves/ 2 https //haakinformatie nl/patroon/kleding/wanten/haakpatroon-simpele-vingerloze-handschoenen/
